blocks.name: csup
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include supremum of class ` A ` . Here ` R ` is ordinarily a relation that strictly orders class ` B ` . For example, ` R ` could be 'less than' and ` B ` could be the set of real numbers.
blocks.origin: prop class csup(class c0, class c1, class c2) { sup(c0, c1, c2) }

df-sup
blocks.content: Define the supremum of class ` A ` . It is meaningful when ` R ` is a relation that strictly orders ` B ` and when the supremum exists. For example, ` R ` could be 'less than', ` B ` could be the set of real numbers, and ` A ` could be the set of all positive reals whose square is less than 2; in this case the supremum is defined as the square root of 2 per ~ sqrtval . See ~ dfsup2 for alternate definition not requiring dummy variables. (Contributed by NM, 22-May-1999.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-sup(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(csup(c0, c1, c2), cuni(crab(s0, c1, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-sup(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ sup(c0, c1, c2)= ⋃ { s0 ∈ c1 |(∀(s1 ∈ c0, ¬ s0[c2]s1)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s1[c2]s0 → ∃(s2 ∈ c0, s1[c2]s2))))}
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
}

blocks.name: df-inf
blocks.content: Define the infimum of class ` A ` . It is meaningful when ` R ` is a relation that strictly orders ` B ` and when the infimum exists. For example, ` R ` could be 'less than', ` B ` could be the set of real numbers, and ` A ` could be the set of all positive reals; in this case the infimum is 0. The infimum is defined as the supremum using the converse ordering relation. In the given example, 0 is the supremum of all reals (greatest real number) for which all positive reals are greater. (Contributed by AV, 2-Sep-2020.)

blocks.name: dfsup2
blocks.content: Quantifier free definition of supremum. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 19-Feb-2013.)

blocks.name: supeq1
blocks.content: Equality theorem for supremum. (Contributed by NM, 22-May-1999.)
blocks.origin:
thm supeq1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(csup(c0, c2, c3), csup(c1, c2, c3)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(csup(c0, c2, c3), csup(c1, c2, c3), cuni(crab(hs0, c2, wa(wral(hs1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c0, wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs2)))))))), cuni(crab(hs0, c2, wa(wral(hs1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c1, wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs2)))))))), wceq(c0, c1))
  unieqd(crab(hs0, c2, wa(wral(hs1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c0, wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs2))))))), crab(hs0, c2, wa(wral(hs1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c1, wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs2))))))), wceq(c0, c1))
  rabbidv(hs0, c2, wceq(c0, c1), wa(wral(hs1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c0, wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs2)))))), wa(wral(hs1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c1, wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs2)))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(c0, c1), wral(hs1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c0, wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs2))))), wral(hs1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c1, wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs2))))))
  raleq(hs1, c0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1))))
  ralbidv(hs1, c2, wceq(c0, c1), wi(wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c0, wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs2)))), wi(wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c1, wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs2)))))
  imbi2d(wceq(c0, c1), wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c0, wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs2))), wrex(hs2, c1, wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs2))))
  rexeq(hs2, c0, c1, wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs2)))
  df-sup(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c2, c3)
  df-sup(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

thm supeq1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 = c1 → sup(c0, c2, c3)= sup(c1, c2, c3))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(sup(c0, c2, c3), sup(c1, c2, c3), ⋃ { hs0 ∈ c2 |(∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ¬ hs0[c3]hs1)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(hs1[c3]hs0 → ∃(hs2 ∈ c0, hs1[c3]hs2))))}, ⋃ { hs0 ∈ c2 |(∀(hs1 ∈ c1, ¬ hs0[c3]hs1)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(hs1[c3]hs0 → ∃(hs2 ∈ c1, hs1[c3]hs2))))}, c0 = c1)
  unieqd({ hs0 ∈ c2 |(∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ¬ hs0[c3]hs1)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(hs1[c3]hs0 → ∃(hs2 ∈ c0, hs1[c3]hs2))))}, { hs0 ∈ c2 |(∀(hs1 ∈ c1, ¬ hs0[c3]hs1)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(hs1[c3]hs0 → ∃(hs2 ∈ c1, hs1[c3]hs2))))}, c0 = c1)
  rabbidv(hs0, c2, c0 = c1, (∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ¬ hs0[c3]hs1)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(hs1[c3]hs0 → ∃(hs2 ∈ c0, hs1[c3]hs2)))), (∀(hs1 ∈ c1, ¬ hs0[c3]hs1)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(hs1[c3]hs0 → ∃(hs2 ∈ c1, hs1[c3]hs2)))))
  anbi12d(c0 = c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ¬ hs0[c3]hs1), ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(hs1[c3]hs0 → ∃(hs2 ∈ c0, hs1[c3]hs2))), ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, ¬ hs0[c3]hs1), ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(hs1[c3]hs0 → ∃(hs2 ∈ c1, hs1[c3]hs2))))
  raleq(hs1, c0, c1, ¬ hs0[c3]hs1)

thm supeq123d(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sup(c0, c1, c2)= sup(c3, c4, c5))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 = c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 = c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 = c5)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(sup(c0, c1, c2), sup(c3, c4, c5), ⋃ { hs0 ∈ c1 |(∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ¬ hs0[c2]hs1)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs1[c2]hs0 → ∃(hs2 ∈ c0, hs1[c2]hs2))))}, ⋃ { hs0 ∈ c4 |(∀(hs1 ∈ c3, ¬ hs0[c5]hs1)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c4,(hs1[c5]hs0 → ∃(hs2 ∈ c3, hs1[c5]hs2))))}, w0)

  raleqbidv(hs1, c0, c3, w0, ¬ hs0[c2]hs1, ¬ hs0[c5]hs1)

blocks.name: nfsup
blocks.content: Hypothesis builder for supremum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Mar-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfsup(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wnfc(s0, csup(c0, c1, c2))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
} = {
  nfcxfr(s0, csup(c0, c1, c2), cuni(cdif(c1, cun(cima(ccnv(c2), c0), cima(c2, cdif(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), c0)))))))
  dfsup2(c0, c1, c2)
  nfuni(s0, cdif(c1, cun(cima(ccnv(c2), c0), cima(c2, cdif(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), c0))))))
  nfdif(s0, c1, cun(cima(ccnv(c2), c0), cima(c2, cdif(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), c0)))))
  nfun(s0, cima(ccnv(c2), c0), cima(c2, cdif(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), c0))))
  nfima(s0, c2, cdif(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), c0)))
  nfdif(s0, c1, cima(ccnv(c2), c0))
  nfima(s0, ccnv(c2), c0)
  nfcnv(s0, c2)
}

blocks.name: supexd
blocks.content: A supremum is a set. (Contributed by NM, 22-May-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm supexd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(csup(c0, c1, c2), universe))
  -| wi(w0, wor(c2, c1))
} = {
  syl5eqel(csup(c0, c1, c2), universe, cuni(crab(hs0, c1, wa(wral(hs1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c0, wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2)))))))), w0)
  df-sup(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1, c2)
  3syl(w0, wcel(cuni(crab(hs0, c1, wa(wral(hs1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c0, wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2)))))))), universe), wrmo(hs0, c1, wa(wral(hs1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c0, wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2))))))), wcel(crab(hs0, c1, wa(wral(hs1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c0, wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2))))))), universe))
  supmo(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, c0, c2, w0)
  rmorabex(hs0, c1, wa(wral(hs1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c0, wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2)))))))
  uniexg(crab(hs0, c1, wa(wral(hs1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c0, wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2))))))), universe)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)

  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm supexd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sup(c0, c1, c2)∈ 𝕌)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ≺ c1)
} = {
  syl5eqel(sup(c0, c1, c2), universe, ⋃ { hs0 ∈ c1 |(∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ¬ hs0[c2]hs1)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs1[c2]hs0 → ∃(hs2 ∈ c0, hs1[c2]hs2))))}, w0)
  df-sup(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1, c2)
  3syl(w0, ⋃ { hs0 ∈ c1 |(∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ¬ hs0[c2]hs1)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs1[c2]hs0 → ∃(hs2 ∈ c0, hs1[c2]hs2))))} ∈ 𝕌, ∃*(hs0 ∈ c1,(∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ¬ hs0[c2]hs1)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs1[c2]hs0 → ∃(hs2 ∈ c0, hs1[c2]hs2))))), { hs0 ∈ c1 |(∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ¬ hs0[c2]hs1)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs1[c2]hs0 → ∃(hs2 ∈ c0, hs1[c2]hs2))))} ∈ 𝕌)
  supmo(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, c0, c2, w0)
  rmorabex(hs0, c1, (∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ¬ hs0[c2]hs1)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs1[c2]hs0 → ∃(hs2 ∈ c0, hs1[c2]hs2)))))
  uniexg({ hs0 ∈ c1 |(∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ¬ hs0[c2]hs1)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs1[c2]hs0 → ∃(hs2 ∈ c0, hs1[c2]hs2))))}, universe)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: supeu
blocks.content: A supremum is unique. Similar to Theorem I.26 of [Apostol] p. 24 (but for suprema in general). (Contributed by NM, 12-Oct-2004.)

  supeu(hs0, s0, s1, c1, c2, c3, wa(w0, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wn(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)))), wral(s0, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0), wrex(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))))))))

  3simpc(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wn(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)))), wral(s0, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0), wrex(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))))))

  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s0, c2, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(s0)))), wral(s0, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0)), wrex(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))))), wral(s0, c2, wn(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)))), wral(s0, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0), wrex(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))))))
  ralbidv(s0, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(s0))), wn(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0))))
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)))
  breq1(cv(hs0), c0, c3, cv(s0))
  ralbidv(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0)), wrex(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)))), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0), wrex(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)))))
  imbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0)), wrex(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0), c3)

blocks.name: eqsupd
blocks.content: Sufficient condition for an element to be equal to the supremum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqsupd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csup(c0, c1, c2), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wor(c2, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wn(wbr(c3, c2, cv(s0))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c2, c3))), wrex(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mp3and(w0, wceq(csup(c0, c1, c2), c3), wcel(c3, c1), wral(s0, c0, wn(wbr(c3, c2, cv(s0)))), wral(s0, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c2, c3), wrex(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, wn(wbr(c3, c2, cv(s0))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c2, c3), wrex(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))))
  expr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c2, c3), wrex(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))))
  eqsup(s0, s1, c3, c1, c0, c2, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eqsupd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sup(c0, c1, c2)= c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ≺ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ ¬ c3[c2]s0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s0[c2]c3))→ ∃(s1 ∈ c0, s0[c2]s1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  mp3and(w0, sup(c0, c1, c2)= c3, c3 ∈ c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ¬ c3[c2]s0), ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(s0[c2]c3 → ∃(s1 ∈ c0, s0[c2]s1))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, ¬ c3[c2]s0)
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, (s0[c2]c3 → ∃(s1 ∈ c0, s0[c2]s1)))
  expr(w0, s0 ∈ c1, s0[c2]c3, ∃(s1 ∈ c0, s0[c2]s1))
  eqsup(s0, s1, c3, c1, c0, c2, w0)
}

blocks.name: supcl
blocks.content: A supremum belongs to its base class (closure law). See also ~ supub and ~ suplub . (Contributed by NM, 12-Oct-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm supcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(csup(c0, c1, c2), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wor(c2, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c1, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  eqeltrd(csup(c0, c1, c2), c1, crio(s0, c1, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))))))), w0)
  supval2(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(crio(s0, c1, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))))))), c1), wreu(s0, c1, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))))))))
  supeu(s0, s1, s2, c1, c0, c2, w0)
  riotacl(s0, c1, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))))
}

blocks.name: supub
blocks.content: A supremum is an upper bound. See also ~ supcl and ~ suplub . This proof demonstrates how to expand an iota-based definition ( ~ df-iota ) using ~ riotacl2 . (Contributed by NM, 12-Oct-2004.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 24-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm supub(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wbr(csup(c1, c2, c3), c3, c0))))
  -| wi(w0, wor(c3, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c2, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  syl(w0, wi(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wbr(csup(c1, c2, c3), c3, c0))), wral(hs0, c1, wn(wbr(csup(c1, c2, c3), c3, cv(hs0)))))
  syl(w0, wral(hs0, c1, wn(wbr(csup(c1, c2, c3), c3, cv(hs0)))), wcel(csup(c1, c2, c3), crab(s0, c2, wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)))))))
  sseldi(csup(c1, c2, c3), crab(s0, c2, wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))))), crab(s0, c2, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2))))))), w0)
  ss2rabi(s0, c2, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2)))))), wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)))))
  a1i(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wi(wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2)))))), wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))))))
  simpl(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2))))))
  eqeltrd(csup(c1, c2, c3), crab(s0, c2, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2))))))), crio(s0, c2, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2))))))), w0)
  supval2(s0, s1, s2, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(crio(s0, c2, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2))))))), crab(s0, c2, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2)))))))), wreu(s0, c2, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2))))))))
  supeu(s0, s1, s2, c2, c1, c3, w0)
  riotacl2(s0, c2, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2)))))))
  simprbi(wcel(csup(c1, c2, c3), crab(s0, c2, wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)))))), wral(hs0, c1, wn(wbr(csup(c1, c2, c3), c3, cv(hs0)))), wcel(csup(c1, c2, c3), c2))
  elrab(s0, csup(c1, c2, c3), c2, wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)))), wral(hs0, c1, wn(wbr(csup(c1, c2, c3), c3, cv(hs0)))))
  syl5bb(wceq(cv(s0), csup(c1, c2, c3)), wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)))), wral(hs0, c1, wn(wbr(csup(c1, c2, c3), c3, cv(hs0)))), wral(hs0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0)))))
  cbvralv(s1, hs0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0))))
  notbid(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0)))

  ralbidv(hs0, c1, wceq(cv(s0), csup(c1, c2, c3)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0))), wn(wbr(csup(c1, c2, c3), c3, cv(hs0))))

thm supub(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∈ c1 → ¬ sup(c1, c2, c3)[c3]c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ≺ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c2,(∀(s1 ∈ c1, ¬ s0[c3]s1)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(s1[c3]s0 → ∃(s2 ∈ c1, s1[c3]s2))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
} = {
  syl(w0, (c0 ∈ c1 → ¬ sup(c1, c2, c3)[c3]c0), ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ¬ sup(c1, c2, c3)[c3]hs0))
  syl(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ¬ sup(c1, c2, c3)[c3]hs0), sup(c1, c2, c3)∈ { s0 ∈ c2 | ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ¬ s0[c3]s1)})
  sseldi(sup(c1, c2, c3), { s0 ∈ c2 | ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ¬ s0[c3]s1)}, { s0 ∈ c2 |(∀(s1 ∈ c1, ¬ s0[c3]s1)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(s1[c3]s0 → ∃(s2 ∈ c1, s1[c3]s2))))}, w0)
  ss2rabi(s0, c2, (∀(s1 ∈ c1, ¬ s0[c3]s1)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(s1[c3]s0 → ∃(s2 ∈ c1, s1[c3]s2)))), ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ¬ s0[c3]s1))
  a1i(s0 ∈ c2, ((∀(s1 ∈ c1, ¬ s0[c3]s1)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(s1[c3]s0 → ∃(s2 ∈ c1, s1[c3]s2))))→ ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ¬ s0[c3]s1)))
  simpl(∀(s1 ∈ c1, ¬ s0[c3]s1), ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(s1[c3]s0 → ∃(s2 ∈ c1, s1[c3]s2))))
  eqeltrd(sup(c1, c2, c3), { s0 ∈ c2 |(∀(s1 ∈ c1, ¬ s0[c3]s1)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(s1[c3]s0 → ∃(s2 ∈ c1, s1[c3]s2))))}, iota(s0 ∈ c2,(∀(s1 ∈ c1, ¬ s0[c3]s1)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(s1[c3]s0 → ∃(s2 ∈ c1, s1[c3]s2))))), w0)
  supval2(s0, s1, s2, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, iota(s0 ∈ c2,(∀(s1 ∈ c1, ¬ s0[c3]s1)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(s1[c3]s0 → ∃(s2 ∈ c1, s1[c3]s2)))))∈ { s0 ∈ c2 |(∀(s1 ∈ c1, ¬ s0[c3]s1)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(s1[c3]s0 → ∃(s2 ∈ c1, s1[c3]s2))))}, ∃!(s0 ∈ c2,(∀(s1 ∈ c1, ¬ s0[c3]s1)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(s1[c3]s0 → ∃(s2 ∈ c1, s1[c3]s2))))))
  supeu(s0, s1, s2, c2, c1, c3, w0)
  riotacl2(s0, c2, (∀(s1 ∈ c1, ¬ s0[c3]s1)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(s1[c3]s0 → ∃(s2 ∈ c1, s1[c3]s2)))))
  simprbi(sup(c1, c2, c3)∈ { s0 ∈ c2 | ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ¬ s0[c3]s1)}, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ¬ sup(c1, c2, c3)[c3]hs0), sup(c1, c2, c3)∈ c2)
  elrab(s0, sup(c1, c2, c3), c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ¬ s0[c3]s1), ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ¬ sup(c1, c2, c3)[c3]hs0))
  syl5bb(s0 = sup(c1, c2, c3), ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ¬ s0[c3]s1), ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ¬ sup(c1, c2, c3)[c3]hs0), ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ¬ s0[c3]hs0))
  cbvralv(s1, hs0, c1, ¬ s0[c3]s1, ¬ s0[c3]hs0)
  notbid(s1 = hs0, s0[c3]s1, s0[c3]hs0)
  breq2(s1, hs0, s0, c3)
  ralbidv(hs0, c1, s0 = sup(c1, c2, c3), ¬ s0[c3]hs0, ¬ sup(c1, c2, c3)[c3]hs0)
  notbid(s0 = sup(c1, c2, c3), s0[c3]hs0, sup(c1, c2, c3)[c3]hs0)
  breq1(s0, sup(c1, c2, c3), c3, hs0)
  rspccv(hs0, c1, c0, ¬ sup(c1, c2, c3)[c3]hs0, ¬ sup(c1, c2, c3)[c3]c0)
  notbid(hs0 = c0, sup(c1, c2, c3)[c3]hs0, sup(c1, c2, c3)[c3]c0)
  breq2(hs0, c0, sup(c1, c2, c3), c3)
  diff.wral.s(s0, hs0, c1, ¬ sup(c1, c2, c3)[c3]hs0)
  diff.wn.s(s0, sup(c1, c2, c3)[c3]hs0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, sup(c1, c2, c3), c3, hs0)
  diff.csup.s(s0, c1, c2, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.wn.s(s1, s0[c3]hs0)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, s0, c3, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(¬ s0[c3]s1)
  diff.hs0.w(s0 = sup(c1, c2, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(¬ sup(c1, c2, c3)[c3]c0)
}

thm suplub2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

thm suplub2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1)→(c0[c2]sup(c3, c1, c2)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c3, c0[c2]s0)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ≺ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s1 ∈ c1,(∀(s2 ∈ c3, ¬ s1[c2]s2)∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c1,(s2[c2]s1 → ∃(s0 ∈ c3, s2[c2]s0))))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ⊆ c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
} = {
  impbid((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1), c0[c2]sup(c3, c1, c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c3, c0[c2]s0))
  expdimp(w0, c0 ∈ c1, c0[c2]sup(c3, c1, c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c3, c0[c2]s0))
  suplub(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  syl5bi((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1), ∃(s0 ∈ c3, c0[c2]s0), c0[c2]sup(c3, c1, c2), ∃(hs0 ∈ c3, c0[c2]hs0))
  cbvrexv(s0, hs0, c3, c0[c2]s0, c0[c2]hs0)
  breq2(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  rexlimdva(hs0, c3, (w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1), c0[c2]hs0, c0[c2]sup(c3, c1, c2))
  mpjaod(((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c3), (c0[c2]hs0 → c0[c2]sup(c3, c1, c2)), sup(c3, c1, c2)= hs0, hs0[c2]sup(c3, c1, c2))
  a1i(((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c3), (sup(c3, c1, c2)= hs0 →(c0[c2]hs0 → c0[c2]sup(c3, c1, c2))))
  biimprd(sup(c3, c1, c2)= hs0, c0[c2]hs0, c0[c2]sup(c3, c1, c2))
  breq2(sup(c3, c1, c2), hs0, c0, c2)
  expcomd(((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c3), hs0[c2]sup(c3, c1, c2), c0[c2]hs0, c0[c2]sup(c3, c1, c2))
  syl13anc(((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c3), ((c0[c2]hs0 ∧ hs0[c2]sup(c3, c1, c2))→ c0[c2]sup(c3, c1, c2)), c2 ≺ c1, c0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c1, sup(c3, c1, c2)∈ c1)
  simplr(w0, c0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c3)
  sotr(c2, c1, c0, hs0, sup(c3, c1, c2))
  mpbird(((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c3), (sup(c3, c1, c2)= hs0 ∨ hs0[c2]sup(c3, c1, c2)), ¬ sup(c3, c1, c2)[c2]hs0)
  imp((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1), hs0 ∈ c3, ¬ sup(c3, c1, c2)[c2]hs0)
  adantr(w0, c0 ∈ c1, (hs0 ∈ c3 → ¬ sup(c3, c1, c2)[c2]hs0))
  supub(s1, s2, s0, hs0, c3, c1, c2, w0)
  con2bid(((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c3), (sup(c3, c1, c2)= hs0 ∨ hs0[c2]sup(c3, c1, c2)), sup(c3, c1, c2)[c2]hs0)
  syl12anc(((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c3), (sup(c3, c1, c2)[c2]hs0 ↔ ¬(sup(c3, c1, c2)= hs0 ∨ hs0[c2]sup(c3, c1, c2))), c2 ≺ c1, sup(c3, c1, c2)∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c1)
  ad2antrr(w0, c0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c3, c2 ≺ c1)
  ad2antrr(w0, c0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c3, sup(c3, c1, c2)∈ c1)

thm supnub(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wn(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0))))), wn(wbr(c0, c3, csup(c2, c1, c3)))))

  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)

  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  expimpd(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wn(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)))), wn(wbr(c0, c3, csup(c2, c1, c3))))
  con2d(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wral(s0, c2, wn(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)))), wbr(c0, c3, csup(c2, c1, c3)))
  syl6ib(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wbr(c0, c3, csup(c2, c1, c3)), wn(wral(s0, c2, wn(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, c2, wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0))))
  expdimp(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c0, c3, csup(c2, c1, c3)), wrex(s0, c2, wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0))))
  suplub(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c3, c2, w0)

  riotabidv(s0, c1, c0 ≺ c1, (∀(s1 ∈ ∅, ¬ s0[c0]s1)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s1[c0]s0 → ∃(hs0 ∈ ∅, s1[c0]hs0)))), ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ¬ s1[c0]s0))
  a1i(c0 ≺ c1, ((∀(s1 ∈ ∅, ¬ s0[c0]s1)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s1[c0]s0 → ∃(hs0 ∈ ∅, s1[c0]hs0))))↔ ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ¬ s1[c0]s0)))
  bitr3i((∀(s1 ∈ ∅, ¬ s0[c0]s1)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s1[c0]s0 → ∃(hs0 ∈ ∅, s1[c0]hs0)))), ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ¬ s1[c0]s0), ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s1[c0]s0 → ∃(hs0 ∈ ∅, s1[c0]hs0))))
  biantrur(∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s1[c0]s0 → ∃(hs0 ∈ ∅, s1[c0]hs0))), ∀(s1 ∈ ∅, ¬ s0[c0]s1))
  ral0(s1, ¬ s0[c0]s1)
  ralbii(s1, c1, (s1[c0]s0 → ∃(hs0 ∈ ∅, s1[c0]hs0)), ¬ s1[c0]s0)
  ax-mp(((s1[c0]s0 → ∃(hs0 ∈ ∅, s1[c0]hs0))↔ ¬ s1[c0]s0), ¬ ∃(hs0 ∈ ∅, s1[c0]hs0))
  rex0(hs0, s1[c0]hs0)

blocks.name: sup0
blocks.content: The supremum of an empty set under a base set which has a unique smallest element is the smallest element of the base set. (Contributed by AV, 4-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm sup0(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2)))), wreu(s1, c1, wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))), wceq(csup(emptycls, c1, c0), c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  eqtrd(csup(emptycls, c1, c0), c2, crio(s1, c1, wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))), w3a(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2)))), wreu(s1, c1, wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))))
  3ad2ant1(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2)))), wreu(s1, c1, wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))), wceq(csup(emptycls, c1, c0), crio(s1, c1, wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))))
  sup0riota(s1, s0, c0, c1)
  mpbid(w3a(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2)))), wreu(s1, c1, wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))), wceq(crio(s1, c1, wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))), c2), wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2))))
  simp2r(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2))), wreu(s1, c1, wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))))
  syl(w3a(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2)))), wreu(s1, c1, wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))), wb(wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2))), wceq(crio(s1, c1, wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))), c2)), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wreu(s1, c1, wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))))
  3adant1(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2)))), wreu(s1, c1, wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wreu(s1, c1, wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))))
  anim1i(wa(wcel(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2)))), wreu(s1, c1, wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))), wcel(c2, c1))
  simpl(wcel(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2))))
  riota2(s1, c2, c1, wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2))))
  ralbidv(s0, c1, wceq(cv(s1), c2), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2)))
  notbid(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2))
  breq2(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.wral.s(s1, s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2)))

blocks.name: supmax
blocks.content: The greatest element of a set is its supremum. Note that the converse is not true; the supremum might not be an element of the set considered. (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 17-Jun-2008.) (Proof shortened by OpenAI, 30-Mar-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm supmax(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csup(c0, c1, c2), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wor(c2, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wn(wbr(c3, c2, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqsupd(s0, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  syl2an2r(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c2, c3)), wrex(hs0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(hs0))), wcel(c3, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c2, c3))
  simprr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c2, c3))
  rspcev(hs0, c3, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c2, c3), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(hs0)))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c3, cv(s0), c2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(cv(s0), c2, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm supmax(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sup(c0, c1, c2)= c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ≺ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ ¬ c3[c2]s0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqsupd(s0, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  syl2an2r(w0, (s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s0[c2]c3), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, s0[c2]hs0), c3 ∈ c0, s0[c2]c3)
  simprr(w0, s0 ∈ c1, s0[c2]c3)
  rspcev(hs0, c3, c0, s0[c2]c3, s0[c2]hs0)
  breq2(hs0, c3, s0, c2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(s0[c2]c3)
}

  a1ii(wi(wa(wor(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, cfn), wne(c2, emptycls), wss(c2, c1))), wrex(s0, c2, wa(wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c2, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))))), diffsc(s2, c1))
  3syl(wa(wor(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, cfn), wne(c2, emptycls), wss(c2, c1))), wrex(s0, c2, wa(wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c2, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))), wreu(s0, c2, wa(wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c2, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))), wrex(s0, c2, wa(wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c2, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))))
  3imp2(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfn), wne(c2, emptycls), wss(c2, c1), wreu(s0, c2, wa(wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c2, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))))
  com4l(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfn), wne(c2, emptycls), wss(c2, c1), wreu(s0, c2, wa(wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c2, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))))
  syl6(wss(c2, c1), wor(c0, c1), wi(wcel(c2, cfn), wi(wne(c2, emptycls), wreu(s0, c2, wa(wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c2, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))))), wor(c0, c2))
  soss(c2, c1, c0)

  supeu(s0, s1, s2, c2, c2, c0, w3a(wor(c0, c2), wcel(c2, cfn), wne(c2, emptycls)))
  simp1(wor(c0, c2), wcel(c2, cfn), wne(c2, emptycls))
  fisupg(s0, s1, s2, c0, c2)
  reurex(s0, c2, wa(wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c2, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))))

blocks.name: fisupcl

blocks.origin:
thm fisupcl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wor(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, cfn), wne(c2, emptycls), wss(c2, c1))), wcel(csup(c2, c1, c0), c2))

  syl22anc(wa(wor(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, cfn), wne(c2, emptycls), wss(c2, c1))), wceq(crio(hs0, c2, wa(wral(hs1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c2, wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))))))), crio(hs0, c1, wa(wral(hs1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c2, wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))))))), wss(c2, c1), wral(hs0, c2, wi(wa(wral(hs1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c2, wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))))), wa(wral(hs1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c2, wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))))))), wrex(hs0, c2, wa(wral(hs1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c2, wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))))))), wreu(hs0, c1, wa(wral(hs1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c2, wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))))))))
  a1i(wa(wor(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, cfn), wne(c2, emptycls), wss(c2, c1))), wral(hs0, c2, wi(wa(wral(hs1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c2, wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))))), wa(wral(hs1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c2, wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))))))))

  simpr2(c0 ≺ c1, c2 ∈ Fin, c2 ≠ ∅, c2 ⊆ c1)

blocks.name: supgtoreq
blocks.content: The supremum of a finite set is greater than or equal to all the elements of the set. (Contributed by AV, 1-Oct-2019.)

thm supgtoreq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wo(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wceq(c0, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wor(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c4, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, csup(c4, c3, c1)))
} = {
  notnotrd(w0, wo(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wceq(c0, c2)))
  mtbird(w0, wn(wo(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wceq(c0, c2))), wbr(c2, c1, c0))
  eqnbrtrd(c2, c1, c0, csup(c4, c3, c1), w0)
  mpd(w0, wn(wbr(csup(c4, c3, c1), c1, c0)), wcel(c0, c4))
  supub(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c4, c3, c1, w0)
  sylc(w0, wrex(hs0, c3, wa(wral(hs1, c4, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, c3, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c4, wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2))))))), wss(c4, c3), wrex(hs0, c4, wa(wral(hs1, c4, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, c3, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c4, wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2))))))))
  syl13anc(w0, wrex(hs0, c4, wa(wral(hs1, c4, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, c3, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c4, wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2))))))), wor(c1, c3), wcel(c4, cfn), wne(c4, emptycls), wss(c4, c3))
  fisup2g(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, c3, c4)
  ssrexv(hs0, c4, c3, wa(wral(hs1, c4, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, c3, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c4, wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2)))))))
  syl6rbb(w0, wn(wo(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wceq(c0, c2))), wbr(c2, c1, c0), wn(wo(wceq(c2, c0), wbr(c0, c1, c2))))
  syl12anc(w0, wb(wbr(c2, c1, c0), wn(wo(wceq(c2, c0), wbr(c0, c1, c2)))), wor(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3))
  eqeltrd(c2, c3, csup(c4, c3, c1), w0)
  sseldd(csup(c4, c3, c1), c3, c4, w0)
  syl13anc(w0, wcel(csup(c4, c3, c1), c4), wor(c1, c3), wcel(c4, cfn), wne(c4, emptycls), wss(c4, c3))
  ne0d(c4, c0, w0)
  fisupcl(c1, c3, c4)
  sseldd(c0, c3, c4, w0)
  sotric(c1, c3, c2, c0)
  notbii(wo(wceq(c2, c0), wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wo(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wceq(c0, c2)))
  bitri(wo(wceq(c2, c0), wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wo(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wceq(c0, c2)), wo(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wceq(c2, c0)))
  orcom(wceq(c2, c0), wbr(c0, c1, c2))
  orbi2i(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wceq(c2, c0), wceq(c0, c2))
  eqcom(c2, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)

thm supgtoreq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[c1]c2 ∨ c0 = c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ≺ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ⊆ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 = sup(c4, c3, c1))
} = {
  notnotrd(w0, (c0[c1]c2 ∨ c0 = c2))
  mtbird(w0, ¬(c0[c1]c2 ∨ c0 = c2), c2[c1]c0)
  eqnbrtrd(c2, c1, c0, sup(c4, c3, c1), w0)
  mpd(w0, ¬ sup(c4, c3, c1)[c1]c0, c0 ∈ c4)
  supub(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c4, c3, c1, w0)
  sylc(w0, ∃(hs0 ∈ c3,(∀(hs1 ∈ c4, ¬ hs0[c1]hs1)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c3,(hs1[c1]hs0 → ∃(hs2 ∈ c4, hs1[c1]hs2))))), c4 ⊆ c3, ∃(hs0 ∈ c4,(∀(hs1 ∈ c4, ¬ hs0[c1]hs1)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c3,(hs1[c1]hs0 → ∃(hs2 ∈ c4, hs1[c1]hs2))))))
  syl13anc(w0, ∃(hs0 ∈ c4,(∀(hs1 ∈ c4, ¬ hs0[c1]hs1)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c3,(hs1[c1]hs0 → ∃(hs2 ∈ c4, hs1[c1]hs2))))), c1 ≺ c3, c4 ∈ Fin, c4 ≠ ∅, c4 ⊆ c3)
  fisup2g(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, c3, c4)
  ssrexv(hs0, c4, c3, (∀(hs1 ∈ c4, ¬ hs0[c1]hs1)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c3,(hs1[c1]hs0 → ∃(hs2 ∈ c4, hs1[c1]hs2)))))
  syl6rbb(w0, ¬(c0[c1]c2 ∨ c0 = c2), c2[c1]c0, ¬(c2 = c0 ∨ c0[c1]c2))
  syl12anc(w0, (c2[c1]c0 ↔ ¬(c2 = c0 ∨ c0[c1]c2)), c1 ≺ c3, c2 ∈ c3, c0 ∈ c3)
  eqeltrd(c2, c3, sup(c4, c3, c1), w0)
  sseldd(sup(c4, c3, c1), c3, c4, w0)
  syl13anc(w0, sup(c4, c3, c1)∈ c4, c1 ≺ c3, c4 ∈ Fin, c4 ≠ ∅, c4 ⊆ c3)
  ne0d(c4, c0, w0)
  fisupcl(c1, c3, c4)
  sseldd(c0, c3, c4, w0)
  sotric(c1, c3, c2, c0)
  notbii((c2 = c0 ∨ c0[c1]c2), (c0[c1]c2 ∨ c0 = c2))
  bitri((c2 = c0 ∨ c0[c1]c2), (c0[c1]c2 ∨ c0 = c2), (c0[c1]c2 ∨ c2 = c0))
  orcom(c2 = c0, c0[c1]c2)
  orbi2i(c0[c1]c2, c2 = c0, c0 = c2)
  eqcom(c2, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)

thm suppr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ≺ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1)→ sup({ c2, c3 }, c1, c0)= if(c3[c0]c2, c2, c3))
} = {
  supmax(hs0, { c2, c3 }, c1, c0, if(c3[c0]c2, c2, c3), (c0 ≺ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1))

  3adant1(c0 ≺ c1, c2 ∈ c1, c3 ∈ c1, if(c3[c0]c2, c2, c3)∈ c1)
  ifcl(c2, c1, c3, c3[c0]c2)
  3adant1(c0 ≺ c1, c2 ∈ c1, c3 ∈ c1, if(c3[c0]c2, c2, c3)∈ { c2, c3 })
  ifpr(c2, c1, c3, c1, c3[c0]c2)
  r19.21bi(hs0, { c2, c3 }, (c0 ≺ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1), ¬ if(c3[c0]c2, c2, c3)[c0]hs0)
  mpbir2and((c0 ≺ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1), ∀(hs0 ∈ { c2, c3 }, ¬ if(c3[c0]c2, c2, c3)[c0]hs0), ¬ if(c3[c0]c2, c2, c3)[c0]c2, ¬ if(c3[c0]c2, c2, c3)[c0]c3)
  ifbothda(c2, c3, (c0 ≺ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1), ¬ if(c3[c0]c2, c2, c3)[c0]c2, c3[c0]c2, ¬ c2[c0]c2, ¬ c3[c0]c2)
  notbid(c2 = if(c3[c0]c2, c2, c3), c2[c0]c2, if(c3[c0]c2, c2, c3)[c0]c2)

  ifbothda(c2, c3, (c0 ≺ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1), ¬ if(c3[c0]c2, c2, c3)[c0]c3, c3[c0]c2, ¬ c2[c0]c3, ¬ c3[c0]c3)
  notbid(c2 = if(c3[c0]c2, c2, c3), c2[c0]c3, if(c3[c0]c2, c2, c3)[c0]c3)
  breq1(c2, if(c3[c0]c2, c2, c3), c0, c3)

  3com23(c0 ≺ c1, c2 ∈ c1, c3 ∈ c1, ¬(c3[c0]c2 ∧ c2[c0]c3))
  3impb(c0 ≺ c1, c3 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c1, ¬(c3[c0]c2 ∧ c2[c0]c3))

  diff.hs0.w(¬ if(c3[c0]c2, c2, c3)[c0]c3)

blocks.name: eqinfd
blocks.content: Sufficient condition for an element to be equal to the infimum. (Contributed by AV, 3-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqinfd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cinf(c0, c1, c2), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wor(c2, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c2, c3)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(c3, c2, cv(s0)))), wrex(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mp3and(w0, wceq(cinf(c0, c1, c2), c3), wcel(c3, c1), wral(s0, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c2, c3))), wral(s0, c1, wi(wbr(c3, c2, cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c2, c3)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, wi(wbr(c3, c2, cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))))
  expr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(c3, c2, cv(s0)), wrex(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))
  eqinf(s0, s1, c3, c1, c0, c2, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eqinfd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → inf(c0, c1, c2)= c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ≺ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ ¬ s0[c2]c3)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c1 ∧ c3[c2]s0))→ ∃(s1 ∈ c0, s1[c2]s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  mp3and(w0, inf(c0, c1, c2)= c3, c3 ∈ c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ¬ s0[c2]c3), ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c3[c2]s0 → ∃(s1 ∈ c0, s1[c2]s0))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, ¬ s0[c2]c3)
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, (c3[c2]s0 → ∃(s1 ∈ c0, s1[c2]s0)))
  expr(w0, s0 ∈ c1, c3[c2]s0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0, s1[c2]s0))
  eqinf(s0, s1, c3, c1, c0, c2, w0)
}

  cnvso(c2, c1)
  riotabidv(s0, c1, w0, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c2), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s2)))))), wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)))))))

  ralbidv(s1, c0, w0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c2), cv(s1))), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))
  notbid(w0, wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c2), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))

  ralbidv(s1, c1, w0, wi(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s2)))), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)))))
  imbi12d(w0, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1))))
  a1i(w0, wb(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))))

  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c2), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s2)))))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c2), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s2)))))))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c2), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s2)))))))), diffsc(s1, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c2), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s2)))))))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c2), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s2)))))))), diffsc(s1, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c2), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s2)))))))), diffsc(s2, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c2), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s2)))))))), diffsc(s2, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c2), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s2)))))))), diffsc(s2, c2))
  sylib(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c2), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s2))))))), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1))))))))
  rexbii(s0, c0, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)))))), wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c2), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s2)))))))
  anbi12i(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1))))), wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c2), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s2))))))
  ralbii(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c2), cv(s1))))
  notbii(wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c2), cv(s1)))
  bicomi(wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c2), cv(s1)))
  brcnv(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))
  ralbii(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)))), wi(wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s2)))))
  imbi12i(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s2))))
  bicomi(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s0)))
  brcnv(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))
  vex(s0)
  rexbii(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s2)))
  bicomi(wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c2), cv(s2)))
  brcnv(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))
  vex(s1)
  vex(s2)
}

blocks.name: infcl
blocks.content: An infimum belongs to its base class (closure law). See also ~ inflb and ~ infglb . (Contributed by AV, 3-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm infcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cinf(c0, c1, c2), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wor(c2, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c1, wa(wral(s1, c0, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  syl5eqel(cinf(c0, c1, c2), c1, csup(c0, c1, ccnv(c2)), w0)
  df-inf(c0, c1, c2)
  supcl(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, ccnv(c2), w0)
  sylib(w0, wor(ccnv(c2), c1), wor(c2, c1))
  cnvso(c2, c1)
  infcllem(s0, s1, s2, c1, c0, c2, w0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c2)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c2)
  diff.ccnv.s(s2, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm infcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → inf(c0, c1, c2)∈ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ≺ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(∀(s1 ∈ c0, ¬ s1[c2]s0)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c2]s1 → ∃(s2 ∈ c0, s2[c2]s1))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  syl5eqel(inf(c0, c1, c2), c1, sup(c0, c1, `' c2), w0)
  df-inf(c0, c1, c2)
  supcl(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, `' c2, w0)
  sylib(w0, `' c2 ≺ c1, c2 ≺ c1)
  cnvso(c2, c1)
  infcllem(s0, s1, s2, c1, c0, c2, w0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c2)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c2)
  diff.ccnv.s(s2, c2)
}

blocks.name: inflb
blocks.content: An infimum is a lower bound. See also ~ infcl and ~ infglb . (Contributed by AV, 3-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm inflb(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wbr(c0, c2, cinf(c1, c3, c2)))))
  -| wi(w0, wor(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c3, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  ex(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wn(wbr(c0, c2, cinf(c1, c3, c2))))
  mtbird(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wbr(c0, c2, cinf(c1, c3, c2)), wbr(csup(c1, c3, ccnv(c2)), ccnv(c2), c0))
  imp(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wn(wbr(csup(c1, c3, ccnv(c2)), ccnv(c2), c0)))
  supub(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c3, ccnv(c2), w0)
  bitrd(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wbr(c0, c2, cinf(c1, c3, c2)), wbr(csup(c1, c3, ccnv(c2)), ccnv(c2), c0), wbr(c0, c2, csup(c1, c3, ccnv(c2))))
  breq2d(c0, c2, cinf(c1, c3, c2), csup(c1, c3, ccnv(c2)), wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(cinf(c1, c3, c2), csup(c1, c3, ccnv(c2))))
  df-inf(c1, c3, c2)
  sylan(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wb(wbr(c0, c2, csup(c1, c3, ccnv(c2))), wbr(csup(c1, c3, ccnv(c2)), ccnv(c2), c0)), wcel(csup(c1, c3, ccnv(c2)), c3))
  supcl(s0, s1, s2, c1, c3, ccnv(c2), w0)
  sylib(w0, wor(ccnv(c2), c3), wor(c2, c3))
  cnvso(c2, c3)
  infcllem(s0, s1, s2, c3, c1, c2, w0)
  bicomd(wa(wcel(csup(c1, c3, ccnv(c2)), c3), wcel(c0, c1)), wbr(c0, c2, csup(c1, c3, ccnv(c2))), wbr(csup(c1, c3, ccnv(c2)), ccnv(c2), c0))
  brcnvg(csup(c1, c3, ccnv(c2)), c3, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c2)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c2)
  diff.ccnv.s(s2, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm inflb(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∈ c1 → ¬ c0[c2]inf(c1, c3, c2)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ≺ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c3,(∀(s1 ∈ c1, ¬ s1[c2]s0)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c3,(s0[c2]s1 → ∃(s2 ∈ c1, s2[c2]s1))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
} = {
  ex(w0, c0 ∈ c1, ¬ c0[c2]inf(c1, c3, c2))
  mtbird((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1), c0[c2]inf(c1, c3, c2), sup(c1, c3, `' c2)[`' c2]c0)
  imp(w0, c0 ∈ c1, ¬ sup(c1, c3, `' c2)[`' c2]c0)
  supub(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c3, `' c2, w0)
  bitrd((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1), c0[c2]inf(c1, c3, c2), sup(c1, c3, `' c2)[`' c2]c0, c0[c2]sup(c1, c3, `' c2))
  breq2d(c0, c2, inf(c1, c3, c2), sup(c1, c3, `' c2), (w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1))
  a1i((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1), inf(c1, c3, c2)= sup(c1, c3, `' c2))
  df-inf(c1, c3, c2)
  sylan(w0, c0 ∈ c1, (c0[c2]sup(c1, c3, `' c2)↔ sup(c1, c3, `' c2)[`' c2]c0), sup(c1, c3, `' c2)∈ c3)
  supcl(s0, s1, s2, c1, c3, `' c2, w0)
  sylib(w0, `' c2 ≺ c3, c2 ≺ c3)
  cnvso(c2, c3)
  infcllem(s0, s1, s2, c3, c1, c2, w0)
  bicomd((sup(c1, c3, `' c2)∈ c3 ∧ c0 ∈ c1), c0[c2]sup(c1, c3, `' c2), sup(c1, c3, `' c2)[`' c2]c0)
  brcnvg(sup(c1, c3, `' c2), c3, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c2)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c2)
  diff.ccnv.s(s2, c2)
}

blocks.name: infglb
blocks.content: An infimum is the greatest lower bound. See also ~ infcl and ~ inflb . (Contributed by AV, 3-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm infglb(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cinf(c2, c1, c3), c3, c0)), wrex(s0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0))))
  -| wi(w0, wor(c3, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s1, c1, wa(wral(s2, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s2), c3, cv(s1)))), wral(s2, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2)), wrex(s0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  expimpd(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cinf(c2, c1, c3), c3, c0), wrex(s0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0)))
  sylbid(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wbr(cinf(c2, c1, c3), c3, c0), wrex(s0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0)), wbr(c0, ccnv(c3), csup(c2, c1, ccnv(c3))))
  syl5bb(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wbr(cinf(c2, c1, c3), c3, c0), wbr(c0, ccnv(c3), csup(c2, c1, ccnv(c3))), wbr(csup(c2, c1, ccnv(c3)), c3, c0))
  breq1i(cinf(c2, c1, c3), c3, c0, csup(c2, c1, ccnv(c3)))
  df-inf(c2, c1, c3)
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wb(wbr(csup(c2, c1, ccnv(c3)), c3, c0), wbr(c0, ccnv(c3), csup(c2, c1, ccnv(c3)))), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(csup(c2, c1, ccnv(c3)), c1))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(csup(c2, c1, ccnv(c3)), c1))
  supcl(s1, s2, s0, c2, c1, ccnv(c3), w0)
  bicomd(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(csup(c2, c1, ccnv(c3)), c1)), wbr(csup(c2, c1, ccnv(c3)), c3, c0), wbr(c0, ccnv(c3), csup(c2, c1, ccnv(c3))))
  brcnvg(c0, c1, csup(c2, c1, ccnv(c3)), c1, c3)
  sylibd(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wbr(c0, ccnv(c3), csup(c2, c1, ccnv(c3))), wrex(s0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0)), wrex(s0, c2, wbr(c0, ccnv(c3), cv(s0))))
  expdimp(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c0, ccnv(c3), csup(c2, c1, ccnv(c3))), wrex(s0, c2, wbr(c0, ccnv(c3), cv(s0))))
  suplub(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, ccnv(c3), c2, w0)
  sylib(w0, wor(ccnv(c3), c1), wor(c3, c1))
  cnvso(c3, c1)
  infcllem(s1, s2, s0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  rexbidv(s0, c2, wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wbr(c0, ccnv(c3), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0))
  sylancl(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(c3), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0)), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), universe))
  simpr(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  vex(s0)
  brcnvg(c0, c1, cv(s0), universe, c3)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c3)
  diff.ccnv.s(s2, c3)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c3)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm infglb(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ inf(c2, c1, c3)[c3]c0)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, s0[c3]c0)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ≺ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s1 ∈ c1,(∀(s2 ∈ c2, ¬ s2[c3]s1)∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c1,(s1[c3]s2 → ∃(s0 ∈ c2, s0[c3]s2))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  expimpd(w0, c0 ∈ c1, inf(c2, c1, c3)[c3]c0, ∃(s0 ∈ c2, s0[c3]c0))
  sylbid((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1), inf(c2, c1, c3)[c3]c0, ∃(s0 ∈ c2, s0[c3]c0), c0[`' c3]sup(c2, c1, `' c3))
  syl5bb((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1), inf(c2, c1, c3)[c3]c0, c0[`' c3]sup(c2, c1, `' c3), sup(c2, c1, `' c3)[c3]c0)
  breq1i(inf(c2, c1, c3), c3, c0, sup(c2, c1, `' c3))
  df-inf(c2, c1, c3)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1), (sup(c2, c1, `' c3)[c3]c0 ↔ c0[`' c3]sup(c2, c1, `' c3)), c0 ∈ c1, sup(c2, c1, `' c3)∈ c1)
  adantr(w0, c0 ∈ c1, sup(c2, c1, `' c3)∈ c1)
  supcl(s1, s2, s0, c2, c1, `' c3, w0)
  bicomd((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ sup(c2, c1, `' c3)∈ c1), sup(c2, c1, `' c3)[c3]c0, c0[`' c3]sup(c2, c1, `' c3))
  brcnvg(c0, c1, sup(c2, c1, `' c3), c1, c3)
  sylibd((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1), c0[`' c3]sup(c2, c1, `' c3), ∃(s0 ∈ c2, s0[c3]c0), ∃(s0 ∈ c2, c0[`' c3]s0))
  expdimp(w0, c0 ∈ c1, c0[`' c3]sup(c2, c1, `' c3), ∃(s0 ∈ c2, c0[`' c3]s0))
  suplub(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, `' c3, c2, w0)
  sylib(w0, `' c3 ≺ c1, c3 ≺ c1)
  cnvso(c3, c1)
  infcllem(s1, s2, s0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  rexbidv(s0, c2, (w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1), c0[`' c3]s0, s0[c3]c0)
  sylancl((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1), (c0[`' c3]s0 ↔ s0[c3]c0), c0 ∈ c1, s0 ∈ 𝕌)
  simpr(w0, c0 ∈ c1)

  diffss.ex(s2, s0)

  diff.ccnv.s(s2, c3)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c3)

}

thm infglbb(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wb(wbr(cinf(c2, c1, c3), c3, c0), wrex(s0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0))))
  -| wi(w0, wor(c3, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s1, c1, wa(wral(s2, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s2), c3, cv(s1)))), wral(s2, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2)), wrex(s0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2))))))))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl5bb(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wbr(cinf(c2, c1, c3), c3, c0), wrex(s0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0)), wbr(csup(c2, c1, ccnv(c3)), c3, c0))
  breq1i(cinf(c2, c1, c3), c3, c0, csup(c2, c1, ccnv(c3)))
  df-inf(c2, c1, c3)

  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wb(wbr(csup(c2, c1, ccnv(c3)), c3, c0), wbr(c0, ccnv(c3), csup(c2, c1, ccnv(c3)))), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(csup(c2, c1, ccnv(c3)), c1))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(csup(c2, c1, ccnv(c3)), c1))
  supcl(s1, s2, s0, c2, c1, ccnv(c3), w0)

  sylancl(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(c3), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0)), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), universe))
  simpr(w0, wcel(c0, c1))

  diffss.ex(s2, s0)

  diff.ccnv.s(s2, c3)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c3)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm infglbb(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1)→(inf(c2, c1, c3)[c3]c0 ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, s0[c3]c0)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ≺ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s1 ∈ c1,(∀(s2 ∈ c2, ¬ s2[c3]s1)∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c1,(s1[c3]s2 → ∃(s0 ∈ c2, s0[c3]s2))))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆ c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl5bb((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1), inf(c2, c1, c3)[c3]c0, ∃(s0 ∈ c2, s0[c3]c0), sup(c2, c1, `' c3)[c3]c0)
  breq1i(inf(c2, c1, c3), c3, c0, sup(c2, c1, `' c3))
  df-inf(c2, c1, c3)
  3bitrd((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1), sup(c2, c1, `' c3)[c3]c0, ∃(s0 ∈ c2, s0[c3]c0), c0[`' c3]sup(c2, c1, `' c3), ∃(s0 ∈ c2, c0[`' c3]s0))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1), (sup(c2, c1, `' c3)[c3]c0 ↔ c0[`' c3]sup(c2, c1, `' c3)), c0 ∈ c1, sup(c2, c1, `' c3)∈ c1)
  adantr(w0, c0 ∈ c1, sup(c2, c1, `' c3)∈ c1)
  supcl(s1, s2, s0, c2, c1, `' c3, w0)
  bicomd((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ sup(c2, c1, `' c3)∈ c1), sup(c2, c1, `' c3)[c3]c0, c0[`' c3]sup(c2, c1, `' c3))
  brcnvg(c0, c1, sup(c2, c1, `' c3), c1, c3)
  suplub2(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, `' c3, c2, w0)
  sylib(w0, `' c3 ≺ c1, c3 ≺ c1)
  cnvso(c3, c1)
  infcllem(s1, s2, s0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  rexbidv(s0, c2, (w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1), c0[`' c3]s0, s0[c3]c0)
  sylancl((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1), (c0[`' c3]s0 ↔ s0[c3]c0), c0 ∈ c1, s0 ∈ 𝕌)
  simpr(w0, c0 ∈ c1)
  vex(s0)
  brcnvg(c0, c1, s0, universe, c3)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)

  diff.ccnv.s(s2, c3)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c3)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, c0 ∈ c1)

}

thm infnlb(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0)))), wn(wbr(cinf(c2, c1, c3), c3, c0))))

  -| wi(w0, wrex(s1, c1, wa(wral(s2, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s2), c3, cv(s1)))), wral(s2, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2)), wrex(s0, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  expimpd(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c3, c0))), wn(wbr(cinf(c2, c1, c3), c3, c0)))

blocks.name: infmin
blocks.content: The smallest element of a set is its infimum. Note that the converse is not true; the infimum might not be an element of the set considered. (Contributed by AV, 3-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm infmin(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c3)

} = {

  syl2an2r(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(c3, c2, cv(s0))), wrex(hs0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0))), wcel(c3, c0), wbr(c3, c2, cv(s0)))

  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c3, c2, cv(s0)))
}

thm infmin(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → inf(c0, c1, c2)= c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ≺ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c0)

  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(c3[c2]s0)
}

blocks.name: infeu
blocks.content: An infimum is unique. (Contributed by AV, 6-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm infeu(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wreu(s0, c0, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1))))))))
  -| wi(w0, wor(c2, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, wreu(s0, c0, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1))))))), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1))))))), wrmo(s0, c0, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1))))))))
  infmo(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  reu5(s0, c0, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)))))))
}

blocks.name: fimin2g
blocks.content: A finite set has a minimum under a total order. (Contributed by AV, 6-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fimin2g(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  syl2anc(w3a(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls)), wfr(c0, c1))
  3simpc(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c1, cfn), wne(c1, emptycls))

  simp1(wor(c0, c2), wcel(c2, cfn), wne(c2, emptycls))

  reximia(s0, c2, wa(wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c2, wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)))))), wa(wral(s1, c2, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c2, wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)))))))

blocks.name: fiinfcl
blocks.content: A nonempty finite set contains its infimum. (Contributed by AV, 3-Sep-2020.)

blocks.name: infltoreq
blocks.content: The infimum of a finite set is less than or equal to all the elements of the set. (Contributed by AV, 4-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm infltoreq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wo(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wceq(c2, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wor(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c4, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cinf(c4, c3, c1)))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wo(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wceq(c2, c0)), wo(wbr(c2, ccnv(c1), c0), wceq(c2, c0)))
  supgtoreq(c2, ccnv(c1), c0, c3, c4, w0)
  sylib(w0, wor(ccnv(c1), c3), wor(c1, c3))
  cnvso(c1, c3)
  syl6eq(c0, csup(c4, c3, ccnv(c1)), cinf(c4, c3, c1), w0)
  df-inf(c4, c3, c1)
  orbi1d(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2), wceq(c2, c0), wbr(c2, ccnv(c1), c0))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, ccnv(c1), c0)), wcel(c2, c4), wcel(c0, c4))
  eqeltrd(c0, c4, cinf(c4, c3, c1), w0)
  syl13anc(w0, wcel(cinf(c4, c3, c1), c4), wor(c1, c3), wcel(c4, cfn), wne(c4, emptycls), wss(c4, c3))
  ne0d(c4, c2, w0)
  fiinfcl(c1, c3, c4)
  bicomd(wa(wcel(c2, c4), wcel(c0, c4)), wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, ccnv(c1), c0))
  brcnvg(c2, c4, c0, c4, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm infltoreq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[c1]c2 ∨ c2 = c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ≺ c3)

blocks.name: infsn
blocks.content: The infimum of a singleton. (Contributed by NM, 2-Oct-2007.)

blocks.name: inf00
blocks.content: The infimum regarding an empty base set is always the empty set. (Contributed by AV, 4-Sep-2020.)

blocks.name: infempty
blocks.content: The infimum of an empty set under a base set which has a unique greatest element is the greatest element of the base set. (Contributed by AV, 4-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm infempty(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0))))), wreu(s1, c1, wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))), wceq(cinf(emptycls, c1, c0), c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  syl5eq(cinf(emptycls, c1, c0), c2, csup(emptycls, c1, ccnv(c0)), w3a(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0))))), wreu(s1, c1, wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))))
  df-inf(emptycls, c1, c0)
  syl3anb(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0))))), wreu(s1, c1, wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wceq(csup(emptycls, c1, ccnv(c0)), c2), wor(ccnv(c0), c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), c2)))), wreu(s1, c1, wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), cv(s1))))))
  cnvso(c0, c1)
  pm5.32i(wcel(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0)))), wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), c2))))
  ralbidva(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c1), wn(wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), c2)))
  notbid(wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), c2))
  bicomd(wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), c2))
  ancoms(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wb(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), c2), wbr(c2, c0, cv(s0))))
  brcnvg(cv(s0), c1, c2, c1, c0)
  reubiia(s1, c1, wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wral(s0, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), cv(s1)))))
  ralbidva(s0, c1, wcel(cv(s1), c1), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), cv(s1))))
  notbid(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), cv(s1)))
  bicomd(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), cv(s1)))
  ancoms(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wb(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  brcnvg(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1), c1, c0)
  sup0(s0, s1, ccnv(c0), c1, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c0)

blocks.name: infiso
blocks.content: Image of an infimum under an isomorphism. (Contributed by AV, 4-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm infiso(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cinf(cima(c0, c1), c2, c3), cfv(c0, cinf(c1, c4, c5))))
  -| wi(w0, wiso(c0, c5, c3, c4, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c4, wa(wral(s1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c4, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s2), c5, cv(s1))))))))
  -| wi(w0, wor(c5, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cinf(cima(c0, c1), c2, c3), cfv(c0, cinf(c1, c4, c5)))), diffsw(s0, w0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cinf(cima(c0, c1), c2, c3), cfv(c0, cinf(c1, c4, c5)))), diffsw(s1, w0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cinf(cima(c0, c1), c2, c3), cfv(c0, cinf(c1, c4, c5)))), diffsw(s2, w0))
  3eqtr4g(cinf(cima(c0, c1), c2, c3), cfv(c0, cinf(c1, c4, c5)), csup(cima(c0, c1), c2, ccnv(c3)), cfv(c0, csup(c1, c4, ccnv(c5))), w0)
  supiso(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, ccnv(c3), c4, ccnv(c5), w0)
  sylib(w0, wiso(c0, ccnv(c5), ccnv(c3), c4, c2), wiso(c0, c5, c3, c4, c2))
  isocnv2(c0, c5, c3, c4, c2)
  infcllem(s0, s1, s2, c4, c1, c5, w0)
  sylib(w0, wor(ccnv(c5), c4), wor(c5, c4))
  cnvso(c5, c4)
  df-inf(cima(c0, c1), c2, c3)
  fveq2i(c0, cinf(c1, c4, c5), csup(c1, c4, ccnv(c5)))
  df-inf(c1, c4, c5)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c3)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c5)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c3)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c5)
  diff.ccnv.s(s2, c3)
  diff.ccnv.s(s2, c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm infiso(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → inf((c0 " c1), c2, c3)=(c0 ` inf(c1, c4, c5)))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 ≅ c5, c3(c4, c2)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ⊆ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c4,(∀(s1 ∈ c1, ¬ s1[c5]s0)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c4,(s0[c5]s1 → ∃(s2 ∈ c1, s2[c5]s1))))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ≺ c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → inf((c0 " c1), c2, c3)=(c0 ` inf(c1, c4, c5))), d(s0, w0))
  a1ii((w0 → inf((c0 " c1), c2, c3)=(c0 ` inf(c1, c4, c5))), d(s1, w0))
  a1ii((w0 → inf((c0 " c1), c2, c3)=(c0 ` inf(c1, c4, c5))), d(s2, w0))
  3eqtr4g(inf((c0 " c1), c2, c3), (c0 ` inf(c1, c4, c5)), sup((c0 " c1), c2, `' c3), (c0 ` sup(c1, c4, `' c5)), w0)
  supiso(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, `' c3, c4, `' c5, w0)
  sylib(w0, (c0 ≅ `' c5, `' c3(c4, c2)), (c0 ≅ c5, c3(c4, c2)))
  isocnv2(c0, c5, c3, c4, c2)
  infcllem(s0, s1, s2, c4, c1, c5, w0)
  sylib(w0, `' c5 ≺ c4, c5 ≺ c4)
  cnvso(c5, c4)
  df-inf((c0 " c1), c2, c3)
  fveq2i(c0, inf(c1, c4, c5), sup(c1, c4, `' c5))
  df-inf(c1, c4, c5)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c3)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c5)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c3)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c5)
  diff.ccnv.s(s2, c3)
  diff.ccnv.s(s2, c5)
}
